episode.title: Dickman v. Commissioner of Internal Revenue

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the judgment and opinion of the Court to announce in Dickman against the Commissioner of Internal Revenue and for reason stated in an opinion filed with the clerk this morning, the judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit is affirm.
Justice Powell filed a dissenting opinion in which Mr. Justice Rehnquist joined.
